name: Lout of Counts Family
author: Yu Ryeo Han &#40유려한&#41
content: Kim Roksu has one life motto: “Let’s not get beat up.”But after dozing off somewhere midway through the novel “Birth of a Hero,” he wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the minor villains in the novel who gets the beating of a lifetime from soon-to-be hero Choi Han.Only time will tell how much longer he has before that dreadful encounter. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life free of the soon-to-be hero?
